website_summaries.verdict: Very comfortable design to use, with a single handle on top and most of the weight in the front.
pros: Includes a motorized brush to make it easier to collect pet hair
Ships with a 16-foot power cord, so you can work for a long time before having to move the cord
Has a stretch hose and a crevice tool to give you a chance to reach tough spots
Includes a bag filtration feature that keeps it smelling fresh
cons: Only offers a 4 amp motor, which is below average for a corded handheld

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this vacuum: you will be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this with hope that I could clean around the area when the brush would not fit. This did not work. The vacuum is very noisy, does not pick up dirt (or in my case cat litter) very well at all, the suction is worthless. I highly suggest that no one purchase one of these vacuums. In my case I threw the box away before testing the vacuum, as the Royal model worked very well and I expected the same from this model. I'll ask Amazon if they will accept a return with no box. I will fully understand if they say no.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff N

customer_reviews.title: Bring back the old model!
customer_reviews.text: We had the old version of this vacuum (without the hose) for well over 10 years and LOVED it. Perfect for vacuuming pet hair from furniture and stairs, and inside cars. The brush roller recently failed, and when I tried to find a replacement, I discovered that the vacuum is so old, they don't even make spare parts for it anymore. So, we replaced it with this model. We've had it less than one month and the brush roller has stopped turning. I confirmed that the belt is installed correctly. Luckily Amazon will still let me return it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Great for stairs.
customer_reviews.text: I mainly bought this to clean the carpeted stairs. Dose a good job. VERY loud. 20 foot cord so you only have to plug it in once. This newer version uses “Dirt Devil Type G” paper bags inside the cloth bag for better dust control over the older version. The hose and crevice tool is new also, the tool is stored inside the hose and you rotate the head cover to transfer suction to hose.
customer_reviews.author: Dane Williams

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Didn't suck....really the side hose is worthless. Bought it for use on carpeted stairs, returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl Steadman

customer_reviews.title: Animal vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum. I bought it because I used to have one almost exactly like it, same brand, and it was perfect for vacuuming my horses when they began shedding in the spring. I know it sounds funny but it does a very good job of getting the shedding hair off the horse, and once used to it, the horse doesn't seem to mind the noise. My horse loves it. I can use it on him without a halter and not being tied. Of course you do have to empty the bag after a couple of groomings if you have a really hairy horse like mine.
customer_reviews.author: Anniepie

customer_reviews.title: Not good  enough to justify damaging your hearing
customer_reviews.text: Decent suction but this doesn’t matter when the noise that comes from it is so loud that your ears ring for days. I bought this to replace my old one which was amazing. The second time I use this it was on my basement stairs. It was so loud I had to take breaks and I kid you not my ears hurt for two days afterwards. Realized this after the 30 day return point. Looks like I’m going to have to wear ear protection in order to vacuum my stairs. Seriously disappointed in the quality of this product dirt devil. This just altered my opinion of your company.
customer_reviews.author: Honest opinion

customer_reviews.title: Hearing protection needed look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: I had forgotten about the poor quality this had become until using this model. I had an original of this model, when it broke down I discovered when I went to replace it they had changed the design. The hose was now permanently connected and always getting in the way and the motor was so loud it required hearing protection to use. It doesn't vacuum debris very well and takes repeated passes with a new bag. Message to Dirt Devil: you ruined this model I will never purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: ChiVet

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with the shield so you can use the attachment.
customer_reviews.text: I have a positive and negative review for this item. It has great suction and picks dirt up quick and easy. Con's, it's loud but that's okay as long as it picks up the dirt. Biggest con, after only a few uses i can not get the shield down so that i can use the attachment. I have tried everything but it won't budge and i don't want to force it and break the shield.
customer_reviews.author: Madonna Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, not worth the hassle
customer_reviews.text: I had this model 10 years ago, and it was amazing back then. The price has doubled and the quality of the materials used and thus the vacuum's ability to do it's job is poor. Never mind how insanely loud it is for the poor suction, but even storing the cord with the attached clip is a struggle. The plastic piece that holds the bag to the vacuum is cheap as well, and doesn't secure easily. Don't waste the time/money/struggle on this updated version of a previously great product.
customer_reviews.author: clesook

customer_reviews.title: Best hand held vacuum on the market.
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these years ago and don't know where it ended up but I loved it because it had such a nice long cord on it and it was super for vacuuming out my car also detailing around your carpeting up against the wall and I honestly think that they've been proved on the style of it I actually like the one that nowadays versus the older one all you have to do to use the hose attachment is to flip the front part down and that's pretty handy I definitely recommend this I just can't say enough good things about it it has a lot of power
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre at best
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this vacuum for at least 7 months since I bought it sometime in 2017. I bought it because I only need a vacuum for mattresses and upholstered furniture. I had given my upright to my grandmother and had hoped to use this smaller one so I could store it more easily. It is mediocre at best. To get it to pick up much you need to change the bags every time you use it. It is not good for pet hair at all.
customer_reviews.author: Althea76

customer_reviews.title: Too Loud!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is really loud. So loud, that I only ever use it on the low setting, because the high setting is too loud. Also, while the brush spins very rapidly, there isn't much suction. The side suction hose has barely any suction. Also, when changing to the hose, the mechanism which flips a plate in front of the main vacuum opening, is hard to use, and could even be dangerous if people weren't careful to shut the vacuum off before switch to hose suction. I would not by this item again.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: It sucks
customer_reviews.text: We had these when I was a kid... I always remember them being so great back then. I don’t know if their quality has changed or if my expectations are just higher now... but this is not how I remembered it. Suction power is garbage. Switching over from vac to hose feels flimsy and cheep. Just not happy. Spend the extra money and buy something newer and better
customer_reviews.author: Linda Angevine

customer_reviews.title: I was so glad to find this
customer_reviews.text: This is the powerful little Dirt Devil I had 20 years ago! I was so glad to find this, and for such a great price! I bought a Black & Decker bagless one (yellow) that had a 4 1⁄2 star rating and only used it a few times before the on/off switch wouldn't move anymore, plus the dirt compartment was difficult to change. This little Dirt Devil is lighter and more powerful. My only complaint would be the cord holder is pretty useless and doesn't hold the cord, and I wish they included at least 1 replacement bag because I know I won't be able to find these in stores.
customer_reviews.author: The M'om

customer_reviews.title: Makes chores easier!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this hand vacuum because I wanted to be able to vacuum my staircase more often and my large vacuum had fallen on me several times while doing so. This little guy is great for regular vacuuming of stairs, floorboards, etc. I wouldn't recommend it for deep cleaning, but once a week seems to rid my staircase of pet hair and dirt. The attachment is very handy and I use an extension to vacuum floorboards without breaking my back. My only complaint is that it is LOUD.
customer_reviews.author: skinnyptop

customer_reviews.title: Powerful yet portable
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is perfect for small hard to reach jobs like: stairs, cars, outdoor rugs and closet floors. The suction is powerful enough to pick up pesky threads, lint and rocks. The only con is that it is really loud, which is magnified when you are inside a car.
customer_reviews.author: R. Brown

customer_reviews.title: No filter, so never loses suction.
customer_reviews.text: Great vac. No filter to get clogged, so it doesn't lose suction. You do need to empty the bag and give it a few smacks to rid of dust. I use our air compressor. This vac has excellent suction, long cord, bag holds a lot and has a built in attachment for getting into tight areas. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: A. M.

customer_reviews.title: I love the power of this
customer_reviews.text: I love the power of this. I have cats and it gets up the cat haur really well. I use it on their cat tree and on my furniture, under the cushions. Its also great in my car. Its has a lot more suction then a rechargeable one.
customer_reviews.author: Leisl Findley

customer_reviews.title: Very noisy
customer_reviews.text: Does just ok. Bought bagless Dirt Devil which does much better with no bags to replace and no noise. Wear hearing protection .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not much suction
customer_reviews.text: This product is great as a hand held but has no suction when using it with the hose part. Returned for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Hollatz

customer_reviews.title: Compact
customer_reviews.text: Great little vacuum, a little loud I guess because the belt is driving the large pick up area even when closed! Seemed like the older models let you disconnect the belt if you were only using the wand small pick up hose!
customer_reviews.author: Rocket Boy

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I had always used this brand and when my very first one broke (had the first one 10+ years), I had to purchase another one. This works as great. Power cord may be a bit short so you might have to buy extensions but overall product is good. Can get quite heavy while carrying.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: works well but very noisy machine
customer_reviews.text: This model works well but is much nosier than a full sized Dyson. I got the corded so the battery would not run out but the cordless and bagless might have been the better option. Works well except for the noise level.
customer_reviews.author: F. B. R.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in 4 months time
customer_reviews.text: This worked great... and then one day just stopped. Now it will not turn on. Doesn't smell burned up. Doesn't seem to have been injured in any way. Just does not turn on. And of course, the 30 day warranty is over.
customer_reviews.author: SLH61956

customer_reviews.title: Really disappointed because I wanted a vacuum with a hose and ...
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed because I wanted a vacuum with a hose and crevice tool with mighty suction. This has virtually no suction through the hose. The brush roller suction is good, but forget the hose. Such a disappointment. I do like that it's a bagged vacuum because canisters just seem to let the dust spread around. My search continues for a small vac with good suction hose. Ugh.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Suction
customer_reviews.text: I needed something small and with a hose for cleaning dust from my desktop pcs....this thing has very poor suction and promptly returned it. I found 12v automotive vacuums with more power than this thing.
customer_reviews.author: wil

customer_reviews.title: Loud and quick to break
customer_reviews.text: Cheap was item. But it ran like a jet engine. So loud I felt like I I should be wearing ear plugs. Suction was OK but for tight low pile carpets it would just throw any small rocks (cat litter) because the brushes where going so fast. Has 2 modes. Loud and really load but only worked for a fees uses before just quitting. Not sure if the electric motor overheated. But it stopped working before I could even fill up the bag it came with. Glad I never ordered more bags for it yet. Definitely not how they used to make dirt devils
customer_reviews.author: nick k

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, efficient
customer_reviews.text: Pretty powerful for such a small product. The cord is a good length. I can vacuum my stairs without an extension cord. The crevice tool is the main reason I chose this one and it works well. Some reviewers say it is too loud. It definitely is loud, but I don't see that as a big issue.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fire Hazard
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use on my 13 basement stair treads. Used 5 times without any problems--worked great. The 6th time it caught fire. And of course the return was up Jan 31. Do not purchase this.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie's Mom

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: The external hose doesn't work and the suction is mediocre for the size. To enable the hose you're supposed to rotate a cover over top of the brush. After doing that the hose doesn't perform.
customer_reviews.author: Chris B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cleaning under couch cushions and on the stairs
customer_reviews.text: Great haldheld vacuum. I use mostly for cleaning under couch cushions and on the stairs. The hose feature is nice for getting into small cracks and crevices. This unit does take bags when it is full of dirt...not sure where to get these yet because mine has not became full yet. A haldheld vacuum that plugged in was a must for me because you cannot rely on the battery operated vacuums.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is a very handy vacuum and I love how easy it is to handle
customer_reviews.text: I have always been a fan of Dirt Devil. I had one of the hand held ones years ago and decided to order another one. It is a very handy vacuum and I love how easy it is to handle. I was however disappointed that I havent been able to find any attatchments such as an extension pole that fits it. I really love the quality of it!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Watkins

customer_reviews.title: a bit noisy but it is great on stairs and tight spots
customer_reviews.text: WOW this is a mighty might.....a bit noisy but it is great on stairs and tight spots.
customer_reviews.author: BlueSky

customer_reviews.title: This one was a great replacement. did the job
customer_reviews.text: needed something to replace my old dirt devil vacuum for the stairs. This one was a great replacement. did the job. Lighter than other competitors which is great for the staircase in my home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Garbage vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst vacuum cleaner I've ever tried in my life. It is louder than a jet airplane, and it vibrates in your hand more than a dentist's drill does in your teeth. I turned it on for 30 seconds, and packed it right back up to return.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Love this little guy - it is my 2nd Dirt ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this little guy - it is my 2nd Dirt Devil and they are everything I need in a hand=held vacuum. It might be a little loud... but it picks up almost everything.
customer_reviews.author: pat cruzan

customer_reviews.title: Small & easy to store & strong suction power makes clean up ...
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for. I use it in my RV. Small & easy to store & strong suction power makes clean up easy. I wish there was an attachment set for it but Dirt Devil does not make one any more. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Vicloc

customer_reviews.title: And when I say it sucks, in this case that's a very good
customer_reviews.text: Of course it's noisy, it's got a powerful motor. And when I say it sucks, in this case that's a very good thing
customer_reviews.author: man7sell

customer_reviews.title: Dirt Devil Handvac...
customer_reviews.text: I had another one of these Bagged Handheld Vaccuums that I bought at Target! I loved the previous one; real good at picking up dog hair and other dirt! The only difference with my first one bought at Target and this one is that this one has a hose on it! Good for digging into narrow spaces. Had my first Dirt Devil for almost 20 years! So, it does last with proper maintenance. Good deal, Amazon.com!
customer_reviews.author: Peachie

customer_reviews.title: SO LOUD! My ears are bleeding!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely must use earplugs every time I use this vacuum, and that's terribly inconvenient. While the cord is long, the attachments don't do much. The suction is okay. I'd rather use my full-size CarpetPro vacuum with a longer cord and better attachments to do the same work and be able to hold a conversation at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Jaggy

customer_reviews.title: Small and Powerful
customer_reviews.text: I've had Dirt Devils in the past but this one is much improved. It has lots of power and does a great job picking up debris. The long cord is really helpful. The hose doesn't give quit the same power as the Dirt Devil beater, but it's a useful item. I would buy this item again.
customer_reviews.author: P_Haag

customer_reviews.title: works okay
customer_reviews.text: There is little suction with the hose and hard to change over from hose to rollers. Disappointed in how it cleans the stairs, no instructions on how to use the hose.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: It really sucks!
customer_reviews.text: Works as anticipated. Only drawback so far is the silly strap that's supposed to keep the cord stowed properly. I've broken nai8ls trying to get the loop fastened securely.
customer_reviews.author: HattieHikesalot

customer_reviews.title: Good product in eco-friendly packaging
customer_reviews.text: I love these little vacuums with beater brushes for cleaning upholstry and carpeted stairs of dust and animal fur. I also loved that the product was delivered with minimal extra packaging and that the manufacturer used cardboard instead of styrafoam to protect the product in the box
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Sieck

customer_reviews.title: It lasts for many years.
customer_reviews.text: It's my second Dirt Devil. They last and last for years. My first one didn't have the hose and nozzle assembly. I prefer not having the hose attachment but I don't think it's still available. The machine is noisy so I wear ear plugs.
customer_reviews.author: Deuce

customer_reviews.title: Happy in
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum met all my expectations and more. I purchased this to replace my old that I had for about 20 years. One day the belt broke. I decided it was time for a new one. I didn't think that this one would out perform the old one but it did. I use the little Dirt Devil on my stairs and it works wonders. My sister replaced her old Dirt Devil as well. You can not purchase this vacuum in stores.
customer_reviews.author: G Walker

customer_reviews.title: Dirt Devil Ultra Power Handheld Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: The Dirt Devil Ultra Power Handheld Vacuum does an excellent cleaning job. It is light to carry, and a variety of attachments are available. I owned one exactly like it before, and when it finally died after years of use, I decided to get another just like it. Part of the decision was made, based on the fact that I already owned the attachments, but clearly if I hadn't liked this vacuum, I wouldn't have bought another just like it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Noisy, inefficient and low quality.
customer_reviews.text: Noisy unit made of cheap plastic. No resemblance to a similar model I bought in 1994. The suction is worse than a cordless unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: I was using a stand up vacuum on the stairs prior to ordering the handheld. I have two flights of stairs and it took several hours to get through them all with moving the vacuum, positioning my body just so, so it wouldn't tumble down the stairs, straining my back. The dirt devil got through each flight in about 30 minutes each. Having the extension tool is great for the crevices but I don't feel much suction with it so not quite sure how well it picks things up. My back and my afternoon are much happier. Picks up cat hair nicely too. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for small jobs around the house . This is too heavy to hold and work with it. Found this out too late to send back.
customer_reviews.author: DREA

customer_reviews.title: Great Powerful and Light
customer_reviews.text: I have two old ones just like this and they died. I love the new version .. So much lighter but a bigger more powerful motor makes it better to use. It does a better job than my older models and is light to handle on the stairs. I am going to get another for the garage and workshop.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS LITTLE VACUUM. IT PICKS UP EVERYTHING. I KEEP IT IN MY LAUNDRY ROOM.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra G. Lofaro

customer_reviews.title: Overall very good hand vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Overall very good hand vacuum. The suction doesn't seem the equal the noise of the motor but I'm sure its trying. Runs perfectly on the 500w inverter mounted in my van.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff C. Robertson

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS MACHINE
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS THE 2ND ON I HAVE BOUGHT. THE ORIGINAL ONE LASTED FOR YEARS. IF YOU HAVE STAIRS THIS IS THE THING FOR YOU.
customer_reviews.author: kj1010

customer_reviews.title: Noisy as a jet plane but works to suck up the cold ashes from my wood stove just ...
customer_reviews.text: Noisy as a jet plane but works to suck up the cold ashes from my wood stove just fine. I like the easy brush/hose design. Very simple to switch modes.
customer_reviews.author: A. LOPILATO

customer_reviews.title: 2nd Time
customer_reviews.text: This unit replaces one that lasted about 20 years. Good little sucker!
customer_reviews.author: Danny A Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Used Dirt Devil 4 times to vacuum stares works good better then the big vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Used Dirt Devil 4 times to vacuum stares works good better then the big vacuum, the Dirt Devil has a brush that fuff up carpet on the steps ,and suck up Durt and is small,not heavy like the big vacuum!
customer_reviews.author: Raymond B.

customer_reviews.title: don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: Awful, Awful,Awful! So loud it will cause you to go deaf!!...Doesn't pick up a thing! Don't know why they changed from original old model which was fantastic,to this piece of c--p! Went in the trash!!
customer_reviews.author: melodybs

customer_reviews.title: The cord is also nice an long
customer_reviews.text: What this vacuum may lack in suction power it makes up for with the brushes. They simply power through any dirt on car floor mats, etc. It is on the loud side, but I can deal with that. The cord is also nice an long.
customer_reviews.author: Begostef

customer_reviews.title: ... Dirt Devil Ultimate Handbag has proved to be an excellent product over the 16 year lifespan of my 1st ...
customer_reviews.text: The Dirt Devil Ultimate Handbag has proved to be an excellent product over the 16 year lifespan of my 1st one: Tough, powerful, handy, almost bulletproof, but VERY loud. When my 1st finally expired, I replaced it with it with an identical unit: same model, same production run. So far, so good. babarkingseal11.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth H. Rilsow

customer_reviews.title: Good vac but loud!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Good suction and the hose attachment is convenient. Cons: bulky and louder than a hurricane! Scares my cat.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: happy customer
customer_reviews.text: now that I live in a split level home, I wanted a hand vac to vacuum the stairs. I am very happy with this! works great
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product and it does exactly what it says it will do... I will definitely buy this again
customer_reviews.author: Rita neel

customer_reviews.title: Small and powerful
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum for our RV. It has good suction and is small enough to store. Don't waste your time buying a battery operated vacuum as the batteries die soon and the suction is weak.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought to replace an older one that finally wore out.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement for an old one that finally bit the dust. I was purchased for my mom who seems to like it.
customer_reviews.author: Darkron

customer_reviews.title: The seller help me just in the moment that I need! A+++++
customer_reviews.text: Excellent seller service! I will be back to get another item! Thanks A++++++
customer_reviews.author: Silvia M.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like the vacuum but disappointed that the tool which should attach to hose was missing.
customer_reviews.author: bbennett

customer_reviews.title: too difficult to use and keep brushroll clean
customer_reviews.text: difficult to move front down to open hose. Can't easily remove bag. If brush roll gets hair clog it is necessary to take apart the front to get at it.I haven't used it and am checking to see ifI can still return it. After professional and check-up cleaning my old dirtdevil is working great and is easier to use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well so far
customer_reviews.text: I got this to remove dog hair from the seats in the truck and my couches. Also to clean up at work after I go into attics and drag insulation back out. For all this, the unit works well, mostly because of the rotating brush. Shop vacs just don't get up dog hair. Unit has plenty of power. I bought extra bags and extra belts just to be prepared after reading others reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great little vac has a great beater bar to pick ...
customer_reviews.text: Great little vac has a great beater bar to pick up dirt . I use it on my carpeted stairs.has more power than battery operated vacs
customer_reviews.author: Paul Forkus Sr

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: no real suction so why is it called a vacuum
customer_reviews.author: Pietro A. Barbieri

customer_reviews.title: Ear Plugs!
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for it to be just a little quieter then our previous Dirt Devil. We needed one with the beater bar so this model was our first choice. We had the original for years but unfortunately dirt found its way into the motor. I priced a new motor but it was cheaper to buy a whole new unit.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C

customer_reviews.title: Love it - used to have one and have missed ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it - used to have one and have missed it terribly. This is great!! Makes doing the stairs sooooo easy!
customer_reviews.author: Shopper Mom

customer_reviews.title: Only used about 12 times motor burned out
customer_reviews.text: After using this item since January the motor has burned out.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for Dog hair removal
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I needed to clean the stair steps. Best vacuum for getting the dog hair off carpet. I am embarrassed to say I worked for the competition and this by far performs so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Great little helper for small jobs
customer_reviews.text: This Dirt Devil Ultra Power handheld vacuum is replacing an old one that finally wore out. It is the greatest little helper to carry around for small jobs and to clean the stairways. It is quite noisy as others state but it sure is so powerful compared to different brands I have had before. Bags are a great price, I've never cared for vacuums without bags as the plastic cups can be quite messy. I highly recommend this vacuum if you don't mind the noise and the price is great.
customer_reviews.author: Judy I.

customer_reviews.title: Indispensable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a Dirt Devil handheld that I'd used for 20 years or so. I use it for cleaning stairs. One improvement in this model that I really like is the on-board crevice tool: It's great for cleaning the edges, and it's there when you need it. Altogether, I'd say they've perfected this indispensable vac.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 uses
customer_reviews.text: Bought this solely to vacuum stairs. It is super loud. So loud in fact I suggest ear plugs. It overheated and motor fried after 2 uses. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: T Marty

customer_reviews.title: works really well and i like the new hose with attachment
customer_reviews.text: This is my new one, gave my daughter my old one as she needed it for her steps. works really well and i like the new hose with attachment.
customer_reviews.author: urabsdi

customer_reviews.title: If your tired of sweeping ?
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vacuum to remove the dog hair from my steps...i was so tired of sweeping. And found out this works great. Very strong motor... good size ...I even use it vacuum out my vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: ethompson49

customer_reviews.title: Got this for quick and easy cleaning of carpeted stairs without having to drag out ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for quick and easy cleaning of carpeted stairs without having to drag out full size vac and this seemed to be only one with a brush roll that would actually do the job right. Insanely loud, so much so I have only used once since receiving.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle R Ford

customer_reviews.title: Very very loud
customer_reviews.text: This little vacuum is perfect for stairs and getting into the crevices but it is VERY VERY LOUD.
customer_reviews.author: JamieB

customer_reviews.title: They loved it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift and they loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Barb J

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Great on Stairs Long cord Suction Hose Cons: Very Loud Hose suction is poor Great vacuum if you only need it for stairs. Not recommended for a vehicle, since the hose is short and suction is not strong enough and it's too bulky to fit into smaller spaces.
customer_reviews.author: ParksideBliss

customer_reviews.title: Functionality is ok but too loud and noisy
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is not that powerful and make so much noise. Noise of this vacuum might cause hearing problem. Functionality is ok better invest more money to get better vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: rinku Dhande

customer_reviews.title: Great for vacuuming stairs
customer_reviews.text: Works great and is lightweight. A little noisy to use but great for stairs!
customer_reviews.author: PhoebeS

customer_reviews.title: Never had any luck with this one.
customer_reviews.text: Does not pick hair up from a low-ply carpet and frequently gets clogged. A brush attachment for the hose would be very useful, but the vacuum repair guy confirmed they don't make them.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Love it for pet hair on furniture
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful, picks up our golden retriever hair off our couches really nice. Really handy for quick spot clean ups and carpeted stairs.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: I love that it will pick up almost anything for a ...
customer_reviews.text: High power. Very versatile. I love that it will pick up almost anything for a little vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila M.

customer_reviews.title: A true classic!
customer_reviews.text: Always loved this product and I was happy to find it again!
customer_reviews.author: Cindie Gunderman

customer_reviews.title: Best portable Sweeper made
customer_reviews.text: Yes, I have 12 steps that have been hard to vacuum. This little bugger does the job. The motor is loud but it works doing a professional job and a very good price. I bought it on Amazon when the manufacturer no longer sells it on their mail order services. A very long cord too, and it is necessary.
customer_reviews.author: William H. Kern, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Works great very nice i recommend this product for stairs and quick clean up
customer_reviews.author: Krwilt

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Good tool when you don't need a full vacuum cleaner. Good Buy
customer_reviews.author: B Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to vacuum my stairs with. It is deafeningly loud. It does not have much power to its suction either. Today when I was finished vacuuming with the hose attachment I noticed dirt falling from the brush. All the dirt I vacuumed with the hose was coming back out of the brush area. The cover was completely closed and the bag was nearly new. Do not waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It has served the purpose for which i bought it very well. It is just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Juneve S. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: LLLOUUDDD!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for cathair, and it works well. But it is SOOOOOO OOO LOOOUUUDDDD. Like REALLLLLYYYYY LOUD. Scares cats, but sucks the cat hair on furniture well. Not great on bare floors.
customer_reviews.author: JLO

customer_reviews.title: I have always loved Dirt Devil since the 80s
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved Dirt Devil since the 80s! It is compact and perfect for our ski boat on the lake. It it light and take very little room. Great value and quality.
customer_reviews.author: SJY

customer_reviews.title: one
customer_reviews.text: I had two older Dirt Devil Vacs and they were great/ Mine wore out so I ordered a new one. This vacuum is almost worthless. Does not compare in any way to my older ones. I will not by another Dirt Devil product.
customer_reviews.author: Janet decker

customer_reviews.title: Motor broke
customer_reviews.text: Though this would last like the original did but this one cheaply made. Mostly plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Henry M.

customer_reviews.title: Weak suction power
customer_reviews.text: Worst suction power I've ever experienced. It was laughable actually.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Burns

product_meta.title: Dirt Devil Hand Vacuum Cleaner Ultra Corded Bagged Handheld Vacuum M08230RED
product_meta.description: Size:1 VacWhether it's pet hair, car interiors, or stairs, when the job is too tough for a broom but too small to haul out the huge vacuum cleaner, grab the Dirt Devil Ultra Power hand vac. With the power of an upright in a lightweight, compact design, the hand vac's 4 amp motor provides powerful suction, and its revolving brush aids deep carpet cleaning. For those tough-to-reach spots, such as under car seats or between couch cushions, the hand vac has a built-in stretch hose and a crevice tool (ready to use with Dirt Devil accessories). The two speeds allow you to vary your suction, but be aware that the lower speed is very gentle and the higher speed is loud. The 20-foot cord ensures a large cleaning radius, and a cord strap provides tidy storage. This hand vac is not recommended for vacuuming long strands of human hair--they tend to get caught in the revolving brush. Be sure you fill out and mail in the warranty card included in the package so you can take advantage of Dirt Devil's two-year limited warranty. Dirt Devil Red Ultra Hand Vac, Features Include 4 Amp Motor, Powerful 2 Speed Motor, Attached Stretch Hose & Crevice Tool, 20' Power Cord, Built In Bag Adapter, 2 Year Manufacturers Warranty, Uses Bag Type "G" Part #3-010347-001, Belt Style "1" Part #3-157260-001
feature_bullets: Motorized Brush - perfect for lifting pet hair and dirt from upholstery, stairs and car interiors
4 Amp Motor for powerful suction. Hose Length: 2 feet, Cleaning Path: 6 inches
Crevice Tool with Stretch Hose - tackle hard-to-reach spaces
16 Foot Power Cord - easily clean without the hassle of unplugging

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars1,357 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
